text:
[Verse]
City lights all around
Crowds so loud hearts pound
Neon glow streets alive
Dancing till the moon dives

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on concrete signs
Rushing through the flashing lines
Late night tales hazy scenes
Chasing after wild dreams

[Chorus]
Lost in the city lights
Shining in the cool night
Under stars so bright
We take flight we take flight

[Verse 3]
Subway ride midnight vibe
Graffiti art urban tribe
Skyscrapers touch the sky
In the city we comply

[Bridge]
Whispers of electric beats
Echoes through the bustling streets
In a maze made of light
Together we ignite

[Chorus]
Lost in the city lights
Shining in the cool night
Under stars so bright
We take flight we take flight
title: Lost in the City Lights
